name: Festive Frenzy
description:
Santa needs the help of his friends to deliever presents to the children in a small town.

//best played in fullscreen

//full game with more presents -> http://halfwaterstudio.com/festivefrenzy.html

Up to 4 Players, everyone controls one of Santas Friends and Helpers or Santa himself.

//the buttons for accepting and picking up are "e" and for crafting "f"

Questions via Twitter: https://twitter.com/halfwaterstudio

or

via email: contact@halfwaterstudio.com

This project was made in 48 hours for the #yogscastgamejam #JingleJam2019

We will continue to update the game even after the jam!  

So visit us again in the future :)
